title: Machines like men
creator_credit: Bill Wright, Michael Latham, Philip Daly and BBC-TV
brief_description: Prescient and fascinating document from BBC-TV exploring the prehistory of contemporary information technology; the filmmakers elaborate some of the [primitive] computer’s potentials: text and voice recognition, simple deductive logic, computer assisted design and voice synthesis. Enquires into the development of robots and the problem this creation poses for human beings.
